summary.span: Exposes static methods for creating, moving, and enumerating through directories and subdirectories.

span.span: Exposes static methods for creating, moving, and enumerating through directories and subdirectories.

summary.span: This class cannot be inherited.

span.span: This class cannot be inherited.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用一般作業，例如複製、 移動、 重新命名、 建立和刪除目錄的類別。Use the class for typical operations such as copying, moving, renaming, creating, and deleting directories. - 若要建立目錄，請使用其中一種方法。To create a directory, use one of the methods. - 若要刪除的目錄，請使用其中一種方法。To delete a directory, use one of the methods. - 取得或設定目前的目錄的應用程式，請使用或方法。To get or set the current directory for an app, use the or method. - 若要管理相關的資訊來建立、 存取和寫入的目錄中，使用方法例如和。To manipulate information related to the creation, access, and writing of a directory, use methods such as and . 靜態方法類別執行的所有方法上的安全性檢查。The static methods of the class perform security checks on all methods. 如果您要重複使用的物件數次，請考慮使用對應的執行個體方法的相反地，因為安全性檢查會不一定有必要。If you are going to reuse an object several times, consider using the corresponding instance method of instead, because the security check will not always be necessary. 如果您正在執行一個目錄相關的動作，可能是更有效率使用靜態方法，而非對應執行個體方法。If you are performing only one directory-related action, it might be more efficient to use a static method rather than a corresponding instance method. 大部分方法需要您操作目錄的路徑。Most methods require the path to the directory that you are manipulating. > [!NOTE] > 在接受字串的成員`path`參數，該路徑必須是格式正確，或在引發例外狀況。In members that accept a string `path` parameter, that path must be well-formed or an exception is raised. 例如，如果路徑是完整的但是開頭空格 ("c:\temp")，路徑字串未修剪，因此路徑會被視為格式不正確，而且會引發例外狀況。For example, if a path is fully qualified but begins with a space (" c:\temp"), the path string isn't trimmed, so the path is considered malformed and an exception is raised. 此外，路徑的組合不被完整的兩倍。In addition, a path or a combination of paths cannot be fully qualified twice. 例如，"c:\temp c:\windows 」 也會引發例外狀況。For example, "c:\temp c:\windows" also raises an exception. 請確定您的路徑是語式正確的當您使用接受路徑字串的方法。Ensure that your paths are well-formed when using methods that accept a path string. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱。For more information see . 接受路徑的成員，在路徑可以參考檔案或目錄。In members that accept a path, the path can refer to a file or a directory. 您可以使用完整的路徑、 相對路徑或通用命名慣例 (UNC) 路徑的伺服器和共用的名稱。You can use a full path, a relative path, or a Universal Naming Convention (UNC) path for a server and share name. 例如，下列所有條件都是可接受的路徑：For example, all the following are acceptable paths: - "c:\\\MyDir 」 以 C# 或 Visual Basic 中的"c:\MyDir"。"c:\\\MyDir" in C#, or "c:\MyDir" in Visual Basic. - 「 MyDir\\\MySubdir 」 以 C# 或 Visual Basic 中的"MyDir\MySubDir"。"MyDir\\\MySubdir" in C#, or "MyDir\MySubDir" in Visual Basic. - 「\\\\\\\MyServer\\\MyShare 」 在 C# 中，或 「\\\MyServer\MyShare 「 在 Visual Basic 中。"\\\\\\\MyServer\\\MyShare" in C#, or "\\\MyServer\MyShare" in Visual Basic. 根據預設，完整讀取/寫入存取新的目錄是授與所有使用者。By default, full read/write access to new directories is granted to all users. 不過，應用程式必須有正確的安全性來存取現有的目錄。However, the app must have the correct security to access existing directories. 目錄和所有其子目錄，結尾以目錄分隔符號字元的路徑字串的指定權限。To demand permissions for a directory and all its subdirectories, end the path string with the directory separator character. (例如，"C:\Temp\\"C:\Temp\ 和其所有的子目錄會授與存取。)若要只針對特定的目錄，結尾加上句號的路徑字串的指定權限。(For example, "C:\Temp\\" grants access to C:\Temp\ and all its subdirectories.) To demand permissions only for a specific directory, end the path string with a period. (例如，"C:\Temp\\。 」(For example, "C:\Temp\\." 僅授權存取至 C:\Temp\\，而非其子目錄。)grants access only to C:\Temp\\, not to its subdirectories.) 在成員接受`searchPattern`參數，搜尋字串可以是任何組合的常值字元和兩個萬用字元所組成;\*和？。In members that accept a `searchPattern` parameter, the search string can be any combination of literal characters and two wildcard characters; \* and ?. 這個參數無法辨識的規則運算式。This parameter does not recognize regular expressions. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱方法或任何其他方法，會使用`searchPattern`參數。For more information, see the method or any other method that uses the `searchPattern` parameter. 如需的一般 I/O 工作清單，請參閱[一般 I/O 工作](~/docs/standard/io/common-i-o-tasks.md)。For a list of common I/O tasks, see [Common I/O Tasks](~/docs/standard/io/common-i-o-tasks.md). 和不支援用於[!INCLUDE[win8_appstore_long](~/includes/win8-appstore-long-md.md)]應用程式。 and are not supported for use in [!INCLUDE[win8_appstore_long](~/includes/win8-appstore-long-md.md)] apps. 如需有關如何存取檔案和資料夾資訊[!INCLUDE[win8_appstore_long](~/includes/win8-appstore-long-md.md)]應用程式，請參閱[存取資料和檔案 （Windows 市集應用程式）](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/windows/apps/hh758319.aspx)。For information about how to access files and folders in [!INCLUDE[win8_appstore_long](~/includes/win8-appstore-long-md.md)] apps, see [Accessing data and files (Windows Store apps)](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/windows/apps/hh758319.aspx). ## Examples 下列範例會示範如何從目錄擷取所有文字檔案，並將它們移至新的目錄。The following example shows how to retrieve all the text files from a directory and move them to a new directory. 檔案移動後，它們不存在原始的目錄中。After the files are moved, they no longer exist in the original directory. [!code-csharp[System.IO.Directory#10](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.IO.Directory/CS/class2.cs#10)] [!code-vb[System.IO.Directory#10](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.IO.Directory/VB/class2.vb#10)] 下列範例示範如何使用方法，以從目錄中，擷取一組文字檔案，然後尋找包含 「 範例 」 的所有行在查詢中使用該集合。The following example demonstrates how to use the method to retrieve a collection of text files from a directory, and then use that collection in a query to find all the lines that contain "Example". [!code-csharp[System.IO.Directory#11](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.IO.Directory/CS/class3.cs#11)] [!code-vb[System.IO.Directory#11](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.IO.Directory/VB/class3.vb#11)] 下列範例會示範如何將目錄和其所有檔案移至新的目錄。The following example demonstrates how to move a directory and all its files to a new directory. 已移動後，原始的目錄不存在。The original directory no longer exists after it has been moved. [!code-csharp[System.IO.Directory#14](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.IO.Directory/CS/class6.cs#14)] [!code-vb[System.IO.Directory#14](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.IO.Directory/VB/class6.vb#14)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 指定的所有目錄`path`所建立，除非它們已經存在，或有部分的`path`無效。Any and all directories specified in `path` are created, unless they already exist or unless some part of `path` is invalid. 如果目錄已經存在，這個方法並不會建立新的目錄，但它會傳回現有的目錄物件。If the directory already exists, this method does not create a new directory, but it returns a object for the existing directory. `path`參數會指定一個目錄路徑，而不是檔案路徑。The `path` parameter specifies a directory path, not a file path. 尾端空白會從結尾`path`參數之前建立的目錄。Trailing spaces are removed from the end of the `path` parameter before creating the directory. 您可以在遠端電腦上具有寫入權限的共用上建立目錄。You can create a directory on a remote computer, on a share that you have write access to. 支援的 UNC 路徑。例如，您可以指定下列`path`:`\\2009\Archives\December`在 Visual Basic 和`\\\\2009\\Archives\\December`C# 中。UNC paths are supported; for example, you can specify the following for `path`: `\\2009\Archives\December` in Visual Basic, and `\\\\2009\\Archives\\December` in C#. 建立目錄，以只冒號字元 （:） 不支援，且會導致`NotSupportedException`擲回。Creating a directory with only the colon character (:) is not supported, and will cause a `NotSupportedException` to be thrown. ## Examples 下列範例會建立和刪除指定的目錄。The following example creates and deletes the specified directory. [!code-cpp[Dir_CreateDir#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_CLR/Dir_CreateDir/CPP/dir_createdir.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[Dir_CreateDir#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR/Dir_CreateDir/CS/dir_createdir.cs#1)] [!code-vb[Dir_CreateDir#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR/Dir_CreateDir/VB/dir_createdir.vb#1)] 若要建立目錄 C:\Users\User1\Public\Html C:\Users\User1 目前的目錄時，使用任何下列呼叫以確保反斜線會正確解譯。To create the directory C:\Users\User1\Public\Html when the current directory is C:\Users\User1, use any of the following calls to ensure that the backslash is interpreted properly. 在 Visual Basic:In Visual Basic: ``` Directory.CreateDirectory("Public\Html") Directory.CreateDirectory("\Users\User1\Public\Html") Directory.CreateDirectory("c:\Users\User1\Public\Html") ``` 在 C# 中：In C#: ``` Directory.CreateDirectory("Public\\Html"); Directory.CreateDirectory("\\Users\\User1\\Public\\Html"); Directory.CreateDirectory("c:\\Users\\User1\\Public\\Html"); ``` 在 c + +:In C++: ``` Directory::CreateDirectory("Public\\Html"); Directory::CreateDirectory("\\Users\\User1\\Public\\Html"); Directory::CreateDirectory("c:\\Users\\User1\\Public\\Html"); ```

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用這個方法多載來建立使用存取控制的目錄，因此沒有機會可以存取目錄，才能套用安全性。Use this method overload to create a directory with access control, so there is no chance the directory can be accessed before security is applied. 指定的所有目錄`path`建立參數，除非它們已經存在，或有部分的`path`無效。Any and all directories specified in the `path` parameter are created, unless they already exist or unless some part of `path` is invalid. `path`參數會指定一個目錄路徑，而不是檔案路徑。The `path` parameter specifies a directory path, not a file path. 如果目錄已經存在，這個方法並不會建立新的目錄，但它會傳回現有的目錄物件。If the directory already exists, this method does not create a new directory, but it returns a object for the existing directory. 尾端空白會從結尾`path`參數之前建立的目錄。Trailing spaces are removed from the end of the `path` parameter before creating the directory. 您可以在遠端電腦上具有寫入權限的共用上建立目錄。You can create a directory on a remote computer, on a share that you have write access to. 支援的 UNC 路徑。例如，您可以指定下列`path`:`\\2009\Archives\December`在 Visual Basic 和`\\\\2009\\Archives\\December`C# 中。UNC paths are supported; for example, you can specify the following for `path`: `\\2009\Archives\December` in Visual Basic, and `\\\\2009\\Archives\\December` in C#. 建立目錄，以只冒號字元 （:） 不支援，而且會導致`NotSupportedException`擲回。Creating a directory with only the colon character (:) is not supported and causes a `NotSupportedException` to be thrown. ## Examples 下列範例會建立新的目錄與兩個使用者帳戶的存取規則。The following example creates a new directory with access rules for two user accounts. [!code-csharp[System.IO.Directory#15](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.IO.Directory/CS/class7.cs#15)] [!code-vb[System.IO.Directory#15](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.IO.Directory/VB/class7.vb#15)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 這個方法的行為即會相同與與`false`第二個參數所指定。This method behaves identically to with `false` specified for the second parameter. `path`參數會指定相對或絕對路徑資訊。The `path` parameter may specify relative or absolute path information. 相對路徑的資訊會解譯為與目前工作目錄。Relative path information is interpreted as relative to the current working directory. 若要取得目前工作目錄，請參閱。To obtain the current working directory, see . 尾端空白會從結尾`path`參數，然後再刪除目錄。Trailing spaces are removed from the end of the `path` parameter before deleting the directory. 這個方法會擲回如果目錄中指定`path`參數含有檔案或子目錄。This method throws an if the directory specified in the `path` parameter contains files or subdirectories. `path`參數不區分大小寫。The `path` parameter is not case-sensitive. 在某些情況下，如果您有指定的目錄中檔案總管 中，開啟方法可能無法將其刪除。In some cases, if you have the specified directory open in File Explorer, the method may not be able to delete it. ## Examples 下列範例會示範如何建立新的目錄和子目錄，然後刪除僅的子目錄。The following example shows how to create a new directory and subdirectory, and then delete only the subdirectory. remarks.format: ## Remarks `path`參數會指定相對或絕對路徑資訊。The `path` parameter may specify relative or absolute path information. 相對路徑的資訊會解譯為與目前工作目錄。Relative path information is interpreted as relative to the current working directory. 若要取得目前工作目錄，請參閱。To obtain the current working directory, see . 尾端空白會從結尾`path`參數，然後再刪除目錄。Trailing spaces are removed from the end of the `path` parameter before deleting the directory. `path`參數不區分大小寫。The `path` parameter is not case-sensitive. 如果`recursive`參數是`true`，使用者必須擁有目前的目錄也與所有子目錄的寫入權限。If the `recursive` parameter is `true`, the user must have write permission for the current directory as well as for all subdirectories. 這個方法的行為稍有不同時刪除目錄，其中包含重新分析點，例如符號連結或掛接點。The behavior of this method differs slightly when deleting a directory that contains a reparse point, such as a symbolic link or a mount point. 如果重新分析點是目錄，例如掛接點，會卸載，並且刪除掛接點。If the reparse point is a directory, such as a mount point, it is unmounted and the mount point is deleted. 這個方法不會遞迴到重新分析點。This method does not recurse through the reparse point. 如果重新分析點檔案的符號連結，已刪除的重新分析點與不符號連結的目標。If the reparse point is a symbolic link to a file, the reparse point is deleted and not the target of the symbolic link. 在某些情況下，如果您有指定的目錄中檔案總管 中，開啟方法可能無法將其刪除。In some cases, if you have the specified directory open in File Explorer, the method may not be able to delete it. ## Examples 下列範例示範如何建立新的目錄、 子目錄和檔案中的子目錄，然後再以遞迴方式刪除所有新的項目。The following example shows how to create a new directory, subdirectory, and file in the subdirectory, and then recursively delete all the new items. remarks.format: ## Remarks 您可以指定相對或絕對路徑資訊中的`path`參數。You can specify relative or absolute path information in the `path` parameter. 相對路徑的資訊會解譯為與目前工作目錄，您可以判斷使用方法。Relative path information is interpreted as relative to the current working directory, which you can determine by using the method. 傳回的目錄名稱前面會加上您在中提供的值`path`參數。The returned directory names are prefixed with the value you provided in the `path` parameter. 例如，如果您提供的相對路徑`path`參數，傳回的目錄名稱會包含相對路徑。For example, if you provide a relative path in the `path` parameter, the returned directory names will contain a relative path. 和方法不同，如下所示： 當您使用，您可以啟動之前，會傳回整個集合，列舉集合中的名稱，當您使用，您必須等候整個陣列的名稱傳回之前可以存取陣列。The and methods differ as follows: When you use , you can start enumerating the collection of names before the whole collection is returned; when you use , you must wait for the whole array of names to be returned before you can access the array. 因此，當您使用許多檔案和目錄、可能會更有效率。Therefore, when you are working with many files and directories, can be more efficient. 傳回的集合不會快取。每次呼叫集合上將會啟動新的列舉型別。The returned collection is not cached; each call to the on the collection will start a new enumeration. ## Examples 下列範例會列舉指定之路徑中的最上層目錄。The following example enumerates the top-level directories in a specified path. remarks.format: ## Remarks `searchPattern` 可以是常值與萬用字元字元的組合，但是它不支援規則運算式。`searchPattern` can be a combination of literal and wildcard characters, but it doesn't support regular expressions. 允許下列萬用字元規範`searchPattern`。The following wildcard specifiers are permitted in `searchPattern`. |萬用字元規範Wildcard specifier|符合Matches| |------------------------|-------------| |\* （星號）\* (asterisk)|該位置中的零或多個字元。Zero or more characters in that position.| |?? （問號）(question mark)|該位置中的零個或一個字元。Zero or one character in that position.| 以外的萬用字元的字元都是常值字元。Characters other than the wildcard are literal characters. 比方說，`searchPattern`字串"\*t 」 中的所有名稱搜尋`path`以字母"t"結尾。For example, the `searchPattern` string "\*t" searches for all names in `path` ending with the letter "t". `searchPattern`字串"s\*」 中的所有名稱搜尋`path`開頭為字母"s"。The `searchPattern` string "s\*" searches for all names in `path` beginning with the letter "s". `searchPattern` 結尾不能兩個句點 ("..") 或包含兩個句點 ("..") 後面接著或，也不能包含任何無效的字元。`searchPattern` cannot end in two periods ("..") or contain two periods ("..") followed by or , nor can it contain any invalid characters. 您可以使用 方法查詢無效字元。You can query for invalid characters by using the method. 您可以指定相對或絕對路徑資訊中的`path`參數。You can specify relative or absolute path information in the `path` parameter. 相對路徑的資訊會解譯為與目前工作目錄，您可以判斷使用方法。Relative path information is interpreted as relative to the current working directory, which you can determine by using the method. 傳回的目錄名稱前面會加上您在中提供的值`path`參數。The returned directory names are prefixed with the value you provided in the `path` parameter. 例如，如果您提供的相對路徑`path`參數，傳回的目錄名稱會包含相對路徑。For example, if you provide a relative path in the `path` parameter, the returned directory names will contain a relative path. 和方法不同，如下所示： 當您使用，您可以啟動之前，會傳回整個集合，列舉集合中的名稱，當您使用，您必須等候整個陣列的名稱傳回之前可以存取陣列。The and methods differ as follows: When you use , you can start enumerating the collection of names before the whole collection is returned; when you use , you must wait for the whole array of names to be returned before you can access the array. 因此，當您使用許多檔案和目錄、可能會更有效率。Therefore, when you are working with many files and directories, can be more efficient. 傳回的集合不會快取。每次呼叫集合上將會啟動新的列舉型別。The returned collection is not cached; each call to the on the collection will start a new enumeration. ## Examples 下列範例會列舉指定之路徑中符合指定的搜尋模式的最上層目錄。The following example enumerates the top-level directories in a specified path that match a specified search pattern. remarks.format: ## Remarks `searchPattern` 可以是常值與萬用字元字元的組合，但是它不支援規則運算式。`searchPattern` can be a combination of literal and wildcard characters, but it doesn't support regular expressions. 允許下列萬用字元規範`searchPattern`。The following wildcard specifiers are permitted in `searchPattern`. |萬用字元規範Wildcard specifier|符合Matches| |------------------------|-------------| |\* （星號）\* (asterisk)|該位置中的零或多個字元。Zero or more characters in that position.| |?? （問號）(question mark)|該位置中的零個或一個字元。Zero or one character in that position.| 以外的萬用字元的字元都是常值字元。Characters other than the wildcard are literal characters. 比方說，`searchPattern`字串"\*t 」 中的所有名稱搜尋`path`以字母"t"結尾。For example, the `searchPattern` string "\*t" searches for all names in `path` ending with the letter "t". `searchPattern`字串"s\*」 中的所有名稱搜尋`path`開頭為字母"s"。The `searchPattern` string "s\*" searches for all names in `path` beginning with the letter "s". > [!NOTE] > 當您使用中的星號萬用字元`searchPattern`例如"\*.txt 」，在指定的擴充功能中的字元數，如下所示會影響搜尋：When you use the asterisk wildcard character in a `searchPattern` such as "\*.txt", the number of characters in the specified extension affects the search as follows: > > - 如果指定的延伸模組是剛好三個字元，則方法會傳回具有延伸模組可開始具有指定之副檔名的檔案。If the specified extension is exactly three characters long, the method returns files with extensions that begin with the specified extension. 例如，"\*.xls"傳回"book.xls"和"book.xlsx"。For example, "\*.xls" returns both "book.xls" and "book.xlsx". > - 在其他情況下，這個方法會傳回完全符合指定之副檔名的檔案。In all other cases, the method returns files that exactly match the specified extension. 例如，"\*.ai"會傳回"file.ai"，而不是"file.aif"。For example, "\*.ai" returns "file.ai" but not "file.aif". > > 當您使用問號萬用字元時，則這個方法會傳回符合指定的副檔名的檔案。When you use the question mark wildcard character, this method returns only files that match the specified file extension. 例如，指定兩個檔案、"file1.txt"和"file1.txtother 」，在目錄中，搜尋模式的 「 檔案？。txt"會傳回只有第一個檔案，而搜尋模式的 「 檔案\*.txt"會傳回這兩個檔案。For example, given two files, "file1.txt" and "file1.txtother", in a directory, a search pattern of "file?.txt" returns just the first file, whereas a search pattern of "file\*.txt" returns both files. `searchPattern` 結尾不能兩個句點 ("..") 或包含兩個句點 ("..") 後面接著或，也不能包含任何無效的字元。`searchPattern` cannot end in two periods ("..") or contain two periods ("..") followed by or , nor can it contain any invalid characters. 您可以使用 方法查詢無效字元。You can query for invalid characters by using the method. 您可以指定相對路徑的資訊與`path`參數。You can specify relative path information with the `path` parameter. 相對路徑的資訊會解譯為與目前工作目錄，您可以判斷使用方法。Relative path information is interpreted as relative to the current working directory, which you can determine by using the method. 和方法不同，如下所示： 當您使用，您可以啟動之前，會傳回整個集合，列舉集合中的名稱，當您使用，您必須等候整個陣列的名稱傳回之前可以存取陣列。The and methods differ as follows: When you use , you can start enumerating the collection of names before the whole collection is returned; when you use , you must wait for the whole array of names to be returned before you can access the array. 因此，當您使用許多檔案和目錄、可能會更有效率。Therefore, when you are working with many files and directories, can be more efficient. 傳回的集合不會快取。每次呼叫集合上將會啟動新的列舉型別。The returned collection is not cached; each call to the on the collection will start a new enumeration. ## Examples 下列範例會示範如何擷取目錄中的所有文字檔案，並將它們移至新的目錄。The following example shows how to retrieve all the text files in a directory and move them to a new directory. 檔案移動後，它們不存在原始的目錄中。After the files are moved, they no longer exist in the original directory. [!code-csharp[System.IO.Directory#10](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.IO.Directory/CS/class2.cs#10)] [!code-vb[System.IO.Directory#10](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.IO.Directory/VB/class2.vb#10)] 下列範例會列舉指定之目錄中副檔名為.txt 的檔案讀取的檔案，每一行，並顯示列，如果它包含字串"Europe"。The following example enumerates the files in the specified directory that have a .txt extension, reads each line of the file, and displays the line if it contains the string "Europe". 在其他情況下，這個方法會傳回完全符合指定之副檔名的檔案。In all other cases, the method returns files that exactly match the specified extension. 例如，"\*.ai"會傳回"file.ai"，而不是"file.aif"。For example, "\*.ai" returns "file.ai" but not "file.aif". > > 當您使用問號萬用字元時，則這個方法會傳回符合指定的副檔名的檔案。When you use the question mark wildcard character, this method returns only files that match the specified file extension. 例如，指定兩個檔案、"file1.txt"和"file1.txtother 」，在目錄中，搜尋模式的 「 檔案？。txt"會傳回只有第一個檔案，而搜尋模式的 「 檔案\*.txt"會傳回這兩個檔案。For example, given two files, "file1.txt" and "file1.txtother", in a directory, a search pattern of "file?.txt" returns just the first file, whereas a search pattern of "file\*.txt" returns both files. `searchPattern` 結尾不能兩個句點 ("..") 或包含兩個句點 ("..") 後面接著或，也不能包含任何無效的字元。`searchPattern` cannot end in two periods ("..") or contain two periods ("..") followed by or , nor can it contain any invalid characters. 您可以使用 方法查詢無效字元。You can query for invalid characters by using the method. 您可以指定相對路徑的資訊與`path`參數。You can specify relative path information with the `path` parameter. 相對路徑的資訊會解譯為與目前工作目錄，您可以判斷使用方法。Relative path information is interpreted as relative to the current working directory, which you can determine by using the method. 和方法不同，如下所示： 當您使用，您可以啟動之前，會傳回整個集合列舉項目的集合，當您使用，您必須等候整個陣列的項目您可以存取陣列之前，先傳回。The and methods differ as follows: When you use , you can start enumerating the collection of entries before the whole collection is returned; when you use , you must wait for the whole array of entries to be returned before you can access the array. 因此，當您使用許多檔案和目錄、可能會更有效率。Therefore, when you are working with many files and directories, can be more efficient. 傳回的集合不會快取。每次呼叫集合上將會啟動新的列舉型別。The returned collection is not cached; each call to the on the collection will start a new enumeration.

在其他情況下，這個方法會傳回完全符合指定之副檔名的檔案。In all other cases, the method returns files that exactly match the specified extension. 例如，"\*.ai"會傳回"file.ai"，而不是"file.aif"。For example, "\*.ai" returns "file.ai" but not "file.aif". > > 當您使用問號萬用字元時，則這個方法會傳回符合指定的副檔名的檔案。When you use the question mark wildcard character, this method returns only files that match the specified file extension. 例如，指定兩個檔案、"file1.txt"和"file1.txtother 」，在目錄中，搜尋模式的 「 檔案？。txt"會傳回只有第一個檔案，而搜尋模式的 「 檔案\*.txt"會傳回這兩個檔案。For example, given two files, "file1.txt" and "file1.txtother", in a directory, a search pattern of "file?.txt" returns just the first file, whereas a search pattern of "file\*.txt" returns both files. `searchPattern` 結尾不能兩個句點 ("..") 或包含兩個句點 ("..") 後面接著或，也不能包含任何無效的字元。`searchPattern` cannot end in two periods ("..") or contain two periods ("..") followed by or , nor can it contain any invalid characters. 您可以使用 方法查詢無效字元。You can query for invalid characters by using the method. 您可以指定相對路徑的資訊與`path`參數。You can specify relative path information with the `path` parameter. 相對路徑的資訊會解譯為與目前工作目錄，您可以判斷使用方法。Relative path information is interpreted as relative to the current working directory, which you can determine by using the method. 和方法不同，如下所示： 當您使用，您可以啟動之前，會傳回整個集合列舉項目的集合，當您使用，您必須等候整個陣列的項目您可以存取陣列之前，先傳回。The and methods differ as follows: When you use , you can start enumerating the collection of entries before the whole collection is returned; when you use , you must wait for the whole array of entries to be returned before you can access the array. 因此，當您使用許多檔案和目錄、可能會更有效率。Therefore, when you are working with many files and directories, can be more efficient. 傳回的集合不會快取。每次呼叫集合上將會啟動新的列舉型別。The returned collection is not cached; each call to the on the collection will start a new enumeration.

remarks.format: ## Remarks `path`參數可以指定相對或絕對路徑資訊。The `path` parameter is permitted to specify relative or absolute path information. 相對路徑的資訊會解譯為與目前工作目錄。Relative path information is interpreted as relative to the current working directory. 尾端空白會從結尾`path`參數之後，再檢查目錄是否存在。Trailing spaces are removed from the end of the `path` parameter before checking whether the directory exists. `path`參數不區分大小寫。The `path` parameter is not case-sensitive. 如果您不需要在目錄中，最小唯讀權限方法會傳回`false`。If you do not have at a minimum read-only permission to the directory, the method will return `false`. 方法會傳回`false`如果發生任何錯誤時嘗試判斷指定的檔案是否存在。The method returns `false` if any error occurs while trying to determine if the specified file exists. 可能發生這種情況下，會引發例外狀況，例如傳遞檔名無效的字元或太多的字元，失敗或遺失的磁碟，或如果呼叫端沒有讀取檔案的權限。This can occur in situations that raise exceptions such as passing a file name with invalid characters or too many characters, a failing or missing disk, or if the caller does not have permission to read the file. ## Examples 下列範例會在命令列上的檔案或目錄名稱陣列，決定何種名稱，並適當地加以處理。The following example takes an array of file or directory names on the command line, determines what kind of name it is, and processes it appropriately. remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用方法來擷取目錄的存取控制清單 (ACL) 項目。Use the method to retrieve the access control list (ACL) entries for a directory. ACL 描述個人及/或群組，讓他們已經有或沒有，在指定的檔案或目錄上採取特定動作的權限。An ACL describes individuals and/or groups who have, or do not have, rights to specific actions on the given file or directory. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱[如何：新增或移除存取控制清單項目](~/docs/standard/io/how-to-add-or-remove-access-control-list-entries.md)。For more information, see [How to: Add or Remove Access Control List Entries](~/docs/standard/io/how-to-add-or-remove-access-control-list-entries.md). 在 NTFS 環境中，和授與使用者時如果使用者具有父資料夾的權限。In NTFS environments, and are granted to the user if the user has rights on the parent folder. 若要拒絕和，拒絕父目錄上。To deny and , deny on the parent directory. ## Examples 下列範例會使用和方法，將存取控制清單 (ACL) 項目，然後從目錄移除 ACL 項目。The following example uses the and the methods to add an access control list (ACL) entry and then remove an ACL entry from a directory. 您必須提供有效的使用者或群組帳戶，才能執行這個範例。You must supply a valid user or group account to run this example. [!code-cpp[IO.DiretoryInfo.GetAccessControl-SetAccessControl#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_CLR/IO.DiretoryInfo.GetAccessControl-SetAccessControl/cpp/sample.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[IO.DiretoryInfo.GetAccessControl-SetAccessControl#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR/IO.DiretoryInfo.GetAccessControl-SetAccessControl/CS/sample.cs#1)] [!code-vb[IO.DiretoryInfo.GetAccessControl-SetAccessControl#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR/IO.DiretoryInfo.GetAccessControl-SetAccessControl/VB/sample.vb#1)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 這個方法相當於以星號 (\*) 指定搜尋模式，所以它會傳回所有子目錄。如果您要搜尋的子目錄，請使用方法，可讓您指定具有子目錄搜尋`searchOption`參數。This method is identical to with the asterisk (\*) specified as the search pattern, so it returns all subdirectories.If you need to search subdirectories, use the method, which enables you to specify a search of subdirectories with the `searchOption` parameter. 和方法不同，如下所示： 當您使用，您可以啟動之前，會傳回整個集合，列舉集合中的名稱，當您使用，您必須等候整個陣列的名稱傳回之前可以存取陣列。The and methods differ as follows: When you use , you can start enumerating the collection of names before the whole collection is returned; when you use , you must wait for the whole array of names to be returned before you can access the array. 因此，當您使用許多檔案和目錄、可能會更有效率。Therefore, when you are working with many files and directories, can be more efficient. `path`參數可以指定相對或絕對路徑資訊。The `path` parameter can specify relative or absolute path information. 相對路徑的資訊會解譯為與目前工作目錄。Relative path information is interpreted as relative to the current working directory. 若要取得目前工作目錄，請參閱。To obtain the current working directory, see . 這個方法所傳回的名稱前面會加上提供的目錄資訊`path`。The names returned by this method are prefixed with the directory information provided in `path`. `path`參數不區分大小寫。The `path` parameter is not case-sensitive. 如需的一般 I/O 工作清單，請參閱[一般 I/O 工作](~/docs/standard/io/common-i-o-tasks.md)。For a list of common I/O tasks, see [Common I/O Tasks](~/docs/standard/io/common-i-o-tasks.md). ## Examples 下列範例會在命令列上的檔案或目錄名稱陣列，決定何種名稱，並適當地加以處理。The following example takes an array of file or directory names on the command line, determines what kind of name it is, and processes it appropriately. remarks.format: ## Remarks 這個方法會傳回指定目錄直接下所有符合指定的搜尋模式的子目錄。This method returns all subdirectories directly under the specified directory that match the specified search pattern. 如果指定的目錄中有任何子目錄，或任何子目錄符合`searchPattern`參數，這個方法會傳回空陣列。If the specified directory has no subdirectories, or no subdirectories match the `searchPattern` parameter, this method returns an empty array. 只有最上層目錄中搜尋。Only the top directory is searched. 如果您想要搜尋的子目錄以及，使用方法並指定中`searchOption`參數。If you want to search the subdirectories as well, use the method and specify in the `searchOption` parameter. `searchPattern` 可以是常值與萬用字元字元的組合，但是它不支援規則運算式。`searchPattern` can be a combination of literal and wildcard characters, but it doesn't support regular expressions. 允許下列萬用字元規範`searchPattern`。The following wildcard specifiers are permitted in `searchPattern`. |萬用字元規範Wildcard specifier|符合Matches| |------------------------|-------------| |\* （星號）\* (asterisk)|該位置中的零或多個字元。Zero or more characters in that position.| |?? （問號）(question mark)|該位置中的零個或一個字元。Zero or one character in that position.| 以外的萬用字元的字元都是常值字元。Characters other than the wildcard are literal characters. 比方說，`searchPattern`字串"\*t 」 中的所有名稱搜尋`path`以字母"t"結尾。For example, the `searchPattern` string "\*t" searches for all names in `path` ending with the letter "t". `searchPattern`字串"s\*」 中的所有名稱搜尋`path`開頭為字母"s"。The `searchPattern` string "s\*" searches for all names in `path` beginning with the letter "s". `searchPattern` 結尾不能兩個句點 ("..") 或包含兩個句點 ("..") 後面接著或，也不能包含任何無效的字元。`searchPattern` cannot end in two periods ("..") or contain two periods ("..") followed by or , nor can it contain any invalid characters. 您可以使用 方法查詢無效字元。You can query for invalid characters by using the method. `path`參數可以指定相對或絕對路徑資訊，且不區分大小寫。The `path` parameter can specify relative or absolute path information, and is not case-sensitive. 相對路徑的資訊會解譯為與目前工作目錄。Relative path information is interpreted as relative to the current working directory. 若要取得目前工作目錄，請參閱。To obtain the current working directory, see . 和方法不同，如下所示： 當您使用，您可以啟動之前，會傳回整個集合，列舉集合中的名稱，當您使用，您必須等候整個陣列的名稱傳回之前可以存取陣列。The and methods differ as follows: When you use , you can start enumerating the collection of names before the whole collection is returned; when you use , you must wait for the whole array of names to be returned before you can access the array. 因此，當您使用許多檔案和目錄、可能會更有效率。Therefore, when you are working with many files and directories, can be more efficient. 如需的一般 I/O 工作清單，請參閱[一般 I/O 工作](~/docs/standard/io/common-i-o-tasks.md)。For a list of common I/O tasks, see [Common I/O Tasks](~/docs/standard/io/common-i-o-tasks.md). ## Examples 下列範例會計算指定字母為開頭的路徑中目錄的數目。The following example counts the number of directories in a path that begin with the specified letter. [!code-cpp[Dir_GetDirs2#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_CLR/Dir_GetDirs2/CPP/dir_getdirs2.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[Dir_GetDirs2#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR/Dir_GetDirs2/CS/dir_getdirs2.cs#1)] [!code-vb[Dir_GetDirs2#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR/Dir_GetDirs2/VB/dir_getdirs2.vb#1)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 和方法不同，如下所示： 當您使用，您可以啟動之前，會傳回整個集合，列舉集合中的名稱，當您使用，您必須等候整個陣列的名稱傳回之前可以存取陣列。The and methods differ as follows: When you use , you can start enumerating the collection of names before the whole collection is returned; when you use , you must wait for the whole array of names to be returned before you can access the array. 因此，當您使用許多檔案和目錄、可能會更有效率。Therefore, when you are working with many files and directories, can be more efficient. 傳回的檔案名稱會附加至提供`path`參數。The returned file names are appended to the supplied `path` parameter. 這個方法相當於以星號 (\*) 指定為搜尋模式。This method is identical to with the asterisk (\*) specified as the search pattern. `path`參數可以指定相對或絕對路徑資訊。The `path` parameter can specify relative or absolute path information. 相對路徑的資訊會解譯為與目前工作目錄。Relative path information is interpreted as relative to the current working directory. 若要取得目前工作目錄，請參閱。To obtain the current working directory, see . 不保證的順序傳回的檔案名稱;使用方法是否需要特定的排序次序。The order of the returned file names is not guaranteed; use the method if a specific sort order is required. `path`參數不區分大小寫。The `path` parameter is not case-sensitive. 如需的一般 I/O 工作清單，請參閱[一般 I/O 工作](~/docs/standard/io/common-i-o-tasks.md)。For a list of common I/O tasks, see [Common I/O Tasks](~/docs/standard/io/common-i-o-tasks.md). ## Examples 下列範例示範如何使用方法來傳回使用者指定的位置中的檔案名稱。The following example demonstrates how to use the method to return file names from a user-specified location. 此範例會設定為通用的這個方法的攔截所有錯誤。The example is configured to catch all errors common to this method. remarks.format: ## Remarks 傳回的檔案名稱會附加至提供`path`參數和傳回的檔案名稱的順序並不保證; 使用方法是否需要特定的排序次序。The returned file names are appended to the supplied `path` parameter and the order of the returned file names is not guaranteed; use the method if a specific sort order is required. `searchPattern` 可以是常值與萬用字元字元的組合，但是它不支援規則運算式。`searchPattern` can be a combination of literal and wildcard characters, but it doesn't support regular expressions. 允許下列萬用字元規範`searchPattern`。The following wildcard specifiers are permitted in `searchPattern`. |萬用字元規範Wildcard specifier|符合Matches| |------------------------|-------------| |\* （星號）\* (asterisk)|該位置中的零或多個字元。Zero or more characters in that position.| |?? （問號）(question mark)|該位置中的零個或一個字元。Zero or one character in that position.| 以外的萬用字元的字元都是常值字元。Characters other than the wildcard are literal characters. 比方說，`searchPattern`字串"\*t 」 中的所有名稱搜尋`path`以字母"t"結尾。For example, the `searchPattern` string "\*t" searches for all names in `path` ending with the letter "t". `searchPattern`字串"s\*」 中的所有名稱搜尋`path`開頭為字母"s"。The `searchPattern` string "s\*" searches for all names in `path` beginning with the letter "s". `searchPattern` 結尾不能兩個句點 ("..") 或包含兩個句點 ("..") 後面接著或，也不能包含任何無效的字元。`searchPattern` cannot end in two periods ("..") or contain two periods ("..") followed by or , nor can it contain any invalid characters. 您可以使用 方法查詢無效字元。You can query for invalid characters by using the method. > [!NOTE] > 當您使用中的星號萬用字元`searchPattern`例如"\*.txt 」，在指定的擴充功能中的字元數，如下所示會影響搜尋：When you use the asterisk wildcard character in a `searchPattern` such as "\*.txt", the number of characters in the specified extension affects the search as follows: > > - 如果指定的延伸模組是剛好三個字元，則方法會傳回具有延伸模組可開始具有指定之副檔名的檔案。If the specified extension is exactly three characters long, the method returns files with extensions that begin with the specified extension. 例如，"\*.xls"傳回"book.xls"和"book.xlsx"。For example, "\*.xls" returns both "book.xls" and "book.xlsx". > - 在其他情況下，這個方法會傳回完全符合指定之副檔名的檔案。In all other cases, the method returns files that exactly match the specified extension. 例如，"\*.ai"會傳回"file.ai"，而不是"file.aif"。For example, "\*.ai" returns "file.ai" but not "file.aif". > > 當您使用問號萬用字元時，則這個方法會傳回符合指定的副檔名的檔案。When you use the question mark wildcard character, this method returns only files that match the specified file extension. 例如，指定兩個檔案、"file1.txt"和"file1.txtother 」，在目錄中，搜尋模式的 「 檔案？。txt"會傳回只有第一個檔案，而搜尋模式的 「 檔案\*.txt"會傳回這兩個檔案。For example, given two files, "file1.txt" and "file1.txtother", in a directory, a search pattern of "file?.txt" returns just the first file, whereas a search pattern of "file\*.txt" returns both files. > [!NOTE] > 這個方法會檢查檔案名稱與 8.3 檔案名稱格式及長檔名格式，因為的搜尋模式類似於 「\*1\*.txt 」 可能會傳回未預期的檔案名稱。Because this method checks against file names with both the 8.3 file name format and the long file name format, a search pattern similar to "\*1\*.txt" may return unexpected file names. 例如，使用搜尋模式的 「\*1\*.txt"傳回"longfilename.txt"，因為對等的 8.3 檔案名稱格式是"LONGFI~1.TXT"。For example, using a search pattern of "\*1\*.txt" returns "longfilename.txt" because the equivalent 8.3 file name format is "LONGFI~1.TXT". 和方法不同，如下所示： 當您使用，您可以啟動之前，會傳回整個集合，列舉集合中的名稱，當您使用，您必須等候整個陣列的名稱傳回之前可以存取陣列。The and methods differ as follows: When you use , you can start enumerating the collection of names before the whole collection is returned; when you use , you must wait for the whole array of names to be returned before you can access the array. 因此，當您使用許多檔案和目錄、可能會更有效率。Therefore, when you are working with many files and directories, can be more efficient. `path`參數可以指定相對或絕對路徑資訊。The `path` parameter can specify relative or absolute path information. 相對路徑的資訊會解譯為與目前工作目錄。Relative path information is interpreted as relative to the current working directory. 若要取得目前工作目錄，請參閱。To obtain the current working directory, see . `path`參數不區分大小寫。The `path` parameter is not case-sensitive. 如需的一般 I/O 工作清單，請參閱[一般 I/O 工作](~/docs/standard/io/common-i-o-tasks.md)。For a list of common I/O tasks, see [Common I/O Tasks](~/docs/standard/io/common-i-o-tasks.md). ## Examples 下列範例會計算指定的字母為開頭的檔案數目。The following example counts the number of files that begin with the specified letter. remarks.format: ## Remarks 不保證的順序傳回的檔案及目錄名稱。使用方法是否需要特定的排序次序。The order of the returned file and directory names is not guaranteed; use the method if a specific sort order is required. 和方法不同，如下所示： 當您使用，您可以啟動之前，會傳回整個集合列舉項目的集合，當您使用，您必須等候整個陣列的項目您可以存取陣列之前，先傳回。The and methods differ as follows: When you use , you can start enumerating the collection of entries before the whole collection is returned; when you use , you must wait for the whole array of entries to be returned before you can access the array. 因此，當您使用許多檔案和目錄、可能會更有效率。Therefore, when you are working with many files and directories, can be more efficient. 這個方法相當於以星號 (\*) 指定為搜尋模式。This method is identical to with the asterisk (\*) specified as the search pattern. `path`參數可以指定相對或絕對路徑資訊。The `path` parameter is permitted to specify relative or absolute path information. 相對路徑的資訊會解譯為與目前工作目錄。Relative path information is interpreted as relative to the current working directory. 若要取得目前工作目錄，請參閱。To obtain the current working directory, see . `path`參數不區分大小寫。The `path` parameter is not case-sensitive. 如需的一般 I/O 工作清單，請參閱[一般 I/O 工作](~/docs/standard/io/common-i-o-tasks.md)。For a list of common I/O tasks, see [Common I/O Tasks](~/docs/standard/io/common-i-o-tasks.md). ## Examples 下列範例會使用每一個字串陣列中要在主控台的方法，以字串陣列中填入所有檔案和子目錄中的使用者指定的位置，並將列印的名稱。The following example uses the method to fill an array of strings with the names of all files and subdirectories in a user-specified location and prints each string in the array to the console. 此範例會設定為通用的這個方法的攔截所有錯誤。The example is configured to catch all errors common to this method. remarks.format: ## Remarks 不保證的順序傳回的檔案及目錄名稱。使用方法是否需要特定的排序次序。The order of the returned file and directory names is not guaranteed; use the method if a specific sort order is required. `searchPattern` 可以是常值與萬用字元字元的組合，但是它不支援規則運算式。`searchPattern` can be a combination of literal and wildcard characters, but it doesn't support regular expressions. 允許下列萬用字元規範`searchPattern`。The following wildcard specifiers are permitted in `searchPattern`. |萬用字元規範Wildcard specifier|符合Matches| |------------------------|-------------| |\* （星號）\* (asterisk)|該位置中的零或多個字元。Zero or more characters in that position.| |?? （問號）(question mark)|該位置中的零個或一個字元。Zero or one character in that position.| 以外的萬用字元的字元都是常值字元。Characters other than the wildcard are literal characters. 比方說，`searchPattern`字串"\*t 」 中的所有名稱搜尋`path`以字母"t"結尾。For example, the `searchPattern` string "\*t" searches for all names in `path` ending with the letter "t". `searchPattern`字串"s\*」 中的所有名稱搜尋`path`開頭為字母"s"。The `searchPattern` string "s\*" searches for all names in `path` beginning with the letter "s". `searchPattern` 結尾不能兩個句點 ("..") 或包含兩個句點 ("..") 後面接著或，也不能包含任何無效的字元。`searchPattern` cannot end in two periods ("..") or contain two periods ("..") followed by or , nor can it contain any invalid characters. 您可以使用 方法查詢無效字元。You can query for invalid characters by using the method. > [!NOTE] > 當您使用中的星號萬用字元`searchPattern`例如"\*.txt 」，在指定的擴充功能中的字元數，如下所示會影響搜尋：When you use the asterisk wildcard character in a `searchPattern` such as "\*.txt", the number of characters in the specified extension affects the search as follows: > > - 如果指定的延伸模組是剛好三個字元，則方法會傳回具有延伸模組可開始具有指定之副檔名的檔案。If the specified extension is exactly three characters long, the method returns files with extensions that begin with the specified extension. 例如，"\*.xls"傳回"book.xls"和"book.xlsx"。For example, "\*.xls" returns both "book.xls" and "book.xlsx". > - 在其他情況下，這個方法會傳回完全符合指定之副檔名的檔案。In all other cases, the method returns files that exactly match the specified extension. 例如，"\*.ai"會傳回"file.ai"，而不是"file.aif"。For example, "\*.ai" returns "file.ai" but not "file.aif". > > 當您使用問號萬用字元時，則這個方法會傳回符合指定的副檔名的檔案。When you use the question mark wildcard character, this method returns only files that match the specified file extension. 例如，指定兩個檔案、"file1.txt"和"file1.txtother 」，在目錄中，搜尋模式的 「 檔案？。txt"會傳回只有第一個檔案，而搜尋模式的 「 檔案\*.txt"會傳回這兩個檔案。For example, given two files, "file1.txt" and "file1.txtother", in a directory, a search pattern of "file?.txt" returns just the first file, whereas a search pattern of "file\*.txt" returns both files. `path`參數可以指定相對或絕對路徑資訊。The `path` parameter is permitted to specify relative or absolute path information. 相對路徑的資訊會解譯為與目前工作目錄。Relative path information is interpreted as relative to the current working directory. 若要取得目前工作目錄，請參閱。To obtain the current working directory, see . `path`參數不區分大小寫。The `path` parameter is not case-sensitive. 如需的一般 I/O 工作清單，請參閱[一般 I/O 工作](~/docs/standard/io/common-i-o-tasks.md)。For a list of common I/O tasks, see [Common I/O Tasks](~/docs/standard/io/common-i-o-tasks.md). ## Examples 下列範例會使用方法將字串陣列中填入所有名稱符合使用者指定的篩選條件，在特定位置的檔案和列印到主控台陣列中的每個字串。The following example uses the method to fill an array of strings with the names of all files matching a user-specified filter in a specific location and prints each string in the array to the console. 此範例會設定為通用的這個方法的攔截所有錯誤。The example is configured to catch all errors common to this method. span.span: Applies access control list (ACL) entries described by a object to the specified directory.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法適用於代表 noninherited 的 ACL 清單的檔案存取控制清單 (ACL) 項目。The method applies access control list (ACL) entries to a file that represents the noninherited ACL list. > [!CAUTION] > 指定 ACL`directorySecurity`參數已取代的現有目錄 ACL。The ACL specified for the `directorySecurity` parameter replaces the existing ACL for the directory. 若要加入之新使用者的權限，請使用方法來取得現有的 ACL 並加以修改。To add permissions for a new user, use the method to obtain the existing ACL and modify it. ACL 描述個人及/或群組，讓他們已經有或沒有，在指定的檔案或目錄上採取特定動作的權限。An ACL describes individuals and/or groups who have, or do not have, rights to specific actions on the given file or directory. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱[如何：新增或移除存取控制清單項目](~/docs/standard/io/how-to-add-or-remove-access-control-list-entries.md)。For more information, see [How to: Add or Remove Access Control List Entries](~/docs/standard/io/how-to-add-or-remove-access-control-list-entries.md). 方法仍然只存在物件建立後已修改的物件。The method persists only objects that have been modified after object creation. 如果不修改物件，不會保存至檔案。If a object has not been modified, it will not be persisted to a file. 因此，不可以擷取物件從一個檔案，並重新套用到另一個檔案的相同物件。Therefore, it is not possible to retrieve a object from one file and reapply the same object to another file. 若要將 ACL 資訊從一個檔案複製到另一個：To copy ACL information from one file to another: 1. 使用方法來擷取從原始程式檔的物件。Use the method to retrieve the object from the source file. 2. 建立新目的地檔案的物件。Create a new object for the destination file. 3. 使用或來源方法擷取 ACL 資訊的物件。Use the or method of the source object to retrieve the ACL information. 4. 使用或方法可複製的資訊擷取到目的地的步驟 3 中物件。Use the or method to copy the information retrieved in step 3 to the destination object. 5. 設定目的地物件到目的地檔案時使用方法。Set the destination object to the destination file using the method. 在 NTFS 環境中，和授與使用者時如果使用者具有父資料夾的權限。In NTFS environments, and are granted to the user if the user has rights on the parent folder. 若要拒絕和，拒絕父目錄上。To deny and , deny on the parent directory. ## Examples 下列範例會使用和方法，將存取控制清單 (ACL) 項目，然後從目錄移除 ACL 項目。The following example uses the and the methods to add an access control list (ACL) entry and then remove an ACL entry from a directory. 您必須提供有效的使用者或群組帳戶，才能執行這個範例。You must supply a valid user or group account to run this example. [!code-cpp[IO.DiretoryInfo.GetAccessControl-SetAccessControl#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_CLR/IO.DiretoryInfo.GetAccessControl-SetAccessControl/cpp/sample.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[IO.DiretoryInfo.GetAccessControl-SetAccessControl#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR/IO.DiretoryInfo.GetAccessControl-SetAccessControl/CS/sample.cs#1)] [!code-vb[IO.DiretoryInfo.GetAccessControl-SetAccessControl#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR/IO.DiretoryInfo.GetAccessControl-SetAccessControl/VB/sample.vb#1)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 當應用程式終止時，工作目錄還原至其原始位置 （其中已啟動處理程序的目錄）。When the application terminates, the working directory is restored to its original location (the directory where the process was started). `path`參數可以指定相對或絕對路徑資訊。The `path` parameter is permitted to specify relative or absolute path information. 相對路徑的資訊會解譯為與目前工作目錄。Relative path information is interpreted as relative to the current working directory. 若要取得目前工作目錄，請參閱。To obtain the current working directory, see . 尾端空白會從結尾`path`參數才能設定目錄。Trailing spaces are removed from the end of the `path` parameter before setting the directory. `path`參數不區分大小寫。The `path` parameter is not case-sensitive. 如果您要設定目錄，例如，若 （"a:"的軟碟機） 或"E"的 CD-ROM 光碟機要卸除式媒體的磁碟機，您可以判斷磁碟機是否準備好使用屬性。If you are setting the directory to a drive with removable media (for example, to "A:" for a floppy disk drive or "E:" for a CD-ROM drive), you can determine whether the drive is ready by using the property. ## Examples 下列範例說明如何設定目前的目錄，並顯示的根目錄。The following example illustrates how to set the current directory and display the directory root. remarks.format: ## Remarks `path`參數可以指定相對或絕對路徑資訊。The `path` parameter is permitted to specify relative or absolute path information. 相對路徑的資訊會解譯為與目前工作目錄。Relative path information is interpreted as relative to the current working directory. 若要取得目前工作目錄，請參閱。To obtain the current working directory, see . `path`參數不區分大小寫。The `path` parameter is not case-sensitive. 如需的一般 I/O 工作清單，請參閱[一般 I/O 工作](~/docs/standard/io/common-i-o-tasks.md)。For a list of common I/O tasks, see [Common I/O Tasks](~/docs/standard/io/common-i-o-tasks.md). ## Examples 使用國際標準時間 (UTC) 的輸出時，下列範例將說明在輸出中的差異。The following example illustrates the differences in output when using Coordinated Universal Time (UTC) output. [!code-cpp[System.IO.UTCExample#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.IO.UTCExample/CPP/example.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[System.IO.UTCExample#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.IO.UTCExample/CS/example.cs#1)] [!code-vb[System.IO.UTCExample#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.IO.UTCExample/VB/example.vb#1)]
